### MF9130E - Introductory course in statistics

8-day intensive course on introductory statistics. April 2023 we made it with R rather than propriety software, coupled with live-coding sessions to enhance understanding of basic concepts such as distribution and hypothesis tests.

[Repository](https://github.com/ocbe-uio/teaching_mf9130e)

[Course website](https://ocbe-uio.github.io/teaching_mf9130e/)
